queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:wk_woocommerce_store` ( `shop_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `store_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `app_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `consumer_key` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `consumer_secret` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `key_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `company_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `status` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A', `default_currency_code` char(3) NOT NULL, `default_cscart_category_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `default_payment` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `default_shipping` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `default_order_status` char(1) DEFAULT NULL, `order_webhook_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `product_create_webhook_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `product_update_webhook_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`shop_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:wk_woocommerce_category_map` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `category_id` int(15) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_category_id` int(15) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_category` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `account_id` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=0;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:wk_woocommerce_shipping_map` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `shipping_id` int(15) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_shipping_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_shipping` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `account_id` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=0;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:wk_woocommerce_payment_map` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `payment_id` int(15) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_payment_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_payment` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `account_id` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=0;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:wk_woocommerce_attribute_map` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `feature_id` int(15) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_attribute_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_attribute` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `account_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_product_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `product_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=0;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:wk_woocommerce_product_map` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `product_id` int(15) NOT NULL, `parent_product_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_product_id` int(15) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_variation_id` bigint(15) NOT NULL, `amount` int(10) NOT NULL, `price` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL, `list_price` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `account_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `combination_key` bigint(15) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=0;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:wk_woocommerce_product_variation` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `product_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `parent_product_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_product_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `variation_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `amount` int(10) NOT NULL, `price` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL, `list_price` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL, `account_id` int(10) NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY (`account_id`,`woocommerce_product_id`, `product_id`, `variation_id`), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=0;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:wk_woocommerce_order_map` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `account_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `order_id` bigint(15) NOT NULL, `woocommerce_order_total` decimal(12,2) NOT NULL, `woo_order_status` text NULL, `currency` char(3) NULL, `woocommerce_order_id` text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;
